Summary Note:
Krol Verhoeven Stevens and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Amsterdam. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Krol Verhoeven Stevens is a 58 year old Private Banker from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Krol Verhoeven Stevens is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Krol received his secondary school diploma from Montessori Lyceum Rotterdam in 1984.
Krol received his degree from Tilburg School of Economics and Management in 1991.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 35 years, Krol Verhoeven Stevens brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Krol Verhoeven Stevens began his professional journey as a Financial Advisor at ING Private Banking in 1990, laying the foundation for future success.
He then transitioned to ABN AMRO MeesPierson as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1993 to 1996.
In 1997, he joined ING Private Banking as a Wealth Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
He appointment as a Family Office Executive at ABN AMRO MeesPierson in 1999 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
He has been a Private Banker at Rabobank Private Banking since 2002, consistently demonstrating his ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 2800000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns 3 exceptional properties: house located in Leeuwarden, valued at approximately 1,437,000.00 EUR, villa located in Haarlem, valued at approximately 2,800,000.00 EUR, flat located in Amsterdam, valued at approximately 1,000,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases his flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Leeuwarden, Amsterdam and Haarlem.
In 2006, he received an inheritance of 610000 EUR from his late mother, who was a prominent Tech Entrepreneur, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Krol as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
